events.text: (Your cellphone is ringing. You accept a call from an unknown number,)
He-Hello?  Can you hear me? You're the New Recruit for our Guild, correct?

events.question: Ahem, let me introduce myself. I'm [color=#00e5f6]Glaciela[/color], the Liutenant of the guild. I'm here to assist you in your first dungeon mission. I assume you already know the [color=#ffd703]basics of combat[/color]?

events.text: That's no problem. I'll walk you through the default controls. Use [color=#ffd703]A[/color] and [color=#ffd703]D[/color] to move left and right, press [color=#ffd703]SPACE[/color] to jump and press [color=#ffd703]ENTER[/color] to attack enemies in your facing direction.

On the top left of your screen is your Stamina Bar. You can press [color=#ffd703]SHIFT[/color] to dash backwards or in your moving direction, or press [color=#ffd703]SPACE[/color] in mid-air to double jump. Both of these actions consume stamina. Stamina regenerates over time.
Damaging and defeating enemies grant Mana that you can use to cast Skills. Try killing the enemies in front of you!
